net.java.jddac.jmdi.gps
Interface GPSInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
GPSSimulator
public interface GPSInterface

A generic interface to query GPS readings on demand.

Method Summary
 void genFix()
          Aquire a GPS fix.
 Location getCellLocation()
          Retrieve the cell tower Location generated from the last fix.
 Float64 getDirection()
          Retrieve the direction information generated from the last fix.
 Location getLocation()
          Retrieve the Location generated from the last fix.
 Float64 getVelocity()
          Retrieve the speed information generated from the last fix.
 

Method Detail

genFix

void genFix()
Aquire a GPS fix. Only one fix can be in-process at a time. This constraint is enforced internal to the genFix method so a caller does not need to worry about this aspect other than to note they can be blocked waiting to generate a fix.

getLocation

Location getLocation()
Retrieve the Location generated from the last fix. The getFix method on Location will return 0 if a valid fix was not obtained.

Returns:
- An instance of Location.

getCellLocation

Location getCellLocation()
Retrieve the cell tower Location generated from the last fix. The getFix method on Location will return 0 if a valid fix was not obtained for the cell location.

Returns:
- An instance of Location.

getVelocity

Float64 getVelocity()
Retrieve the speed information generated from the last fix. The method will return a null if a valid fix was not obtained.

Returns:
Speed in meters/sec

getDirection

Float64 getDirection()
Retrieve the direction information generated from the last fix. The method will return a null if a valid fix was not obtained.

Returns:
directions in degrees from 0 to 359
